topics.body:
*Currently, the heroes are making more damage than the Omnisexual Spider Queen, which isn't that much. Though, the citizens of Earthville are tired of watching this and went back to their normal lives, albeit the dangerous lasers and loud explosions.*

*The amazing and dashing omnipotent narrator, which is me, sips his tea in delight, watching the battle of the hour unfold.*

topics.body: Jesus H tapdancing Christ on a cracker; after that wisconsin girl stabbed someone over slenderman the news for the first time in probably ever has finally finally started discussing how unfortunately so many people and kids don't understand the difference between fiction and reality.  It took them that fucking long to finally get it through their thick ass skulls that the reason why we have so many attacks isn't cause, "ermagod video games" or "ermagod movies", but rather people not understanding what fiction is.
